<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">court sitting in Chicago, Illinois for
purposes of all legal proceedings arising out of, or relating to, the
Transaction Documents or the transactions contemplated thereby.&#160; The Seller and the Servicers hereby
irrevocably waive, to the fullest extent permitted by law, any objection they
may now or hereafter have to the venue of any such proceeding and any claim that
any such proceeding has been brought in an inconvenient forum.&#160; Nothing in this Section&nbsp;9.12 shall
affect the right of the Agent or any Purchaser to bring any action or
proceeding against the Seller, the Servicers or its property in the courts of
other jurisdictions.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><a name="Section9_13"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Section
9.13</font></i></a><i><font style="font-style:italic;">.</font></i><i><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Waiver of
Trial by Jury.</i>&#160; TO THE EXTENT
PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, EACH OF THE SELLER AND THE SERVICERS HERETO
IRREVOCABLY WAIVES ALL RIGHT OF TRIAL BY JURY IN ANY ACTION, PROCEEDING OR
COUNTERCLAIM ARISING OUT OF, OR IN CONNECTION WITH, ANY TRANSACTION DOCUMENT OR
ANY MATTER ARISING THEREUNDER.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><a name="Section9_14"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Section
9.14</font></i></a><i><font style="font-style:italic;">.</font></i><i><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Entire
Agreement</i>.&#160; The Transaction Documents
constitute the entire understanding of the parties thereto concerning the
subject matter thereof.&#160; Any previous or
contemporaneous agreements, whether written or oral, concerning such matters
are superseded thereby.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><a name="Section9_15"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Section
9.15</font></i></a><i><font style="font-style:italic;">.</font></i><i><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>USA
PATRIOT Act Notice</i>.&#160; Each Purchaser
that is subject to the Act (as hereinafter defined) and the Agent (for itself
and not on behalf of any Purchaser) hereby notifies the Seller and the
Servicers that pursuant to the requirements of the USA Patriot Act (Title III
of Pub. L. 107-56 (signed into law October 26, 2001)) (the &#147;<u>Act</u>&#148;), it is
required to obtain, verify and record information that identifies the Seller
and the Servicers, which information includes the name and address of each of
the Seller and the Servicers and other information that will allow such
Purchaser or the Agent, as applicable, to identify the Seller and the Servicers
in accordance with the Act.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><a name="Section9_16"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">Section
9.16</font></i></a><i><font style="font-style:italic;">.</font></i><i><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Concurrent
Amendment and Restatement of Other Transaction Documents</i>.<i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#160; </font></i>The parties hereto
approve and consent to the concurrent amendments and restatements as of the
Restatement Date effected by the Purchase Agreement, the Guaranty and the
Subordinated Note payable to SIRVA Relo.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[SIGNATURE PAGES FOLLOW]</font></p>

executed and delivered by their duly authorized officers as of the date hereof.</font></p>

<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%" style="border-collapse:collapse;width:100.0%;">

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="36%" colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:36.7%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="54%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:54.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="45%" colspan="5" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:45.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">EXECUTIVE
  RELOCATION CORPORATION</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="54%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:54.58%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="45%" colspan="5" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:45.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

  <td width="54%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:54.58%;">

  </td>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">S-2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='S-2',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;"><a name="ScheduleIDefinitions"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-variant:normal !important;">SCHEDULE I<br>
DEFINITIONS</font></b></a></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;font-variant:normal !important;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The following terms have the meanings set forth, or referred to, below:</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Acquisition Costs&#148;</font></i> means, with respect to an
Origination Home, all costs paid in preparing to acquire such Origination Home
pursuant to a Relocation Service Agreement and in preparing the Origination
Home Purchase Contract, including, without limitation, appraisal fees, title
search fees and inspection fees.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Advance Employer Payment&#148;</font></i> means an amount
paid or to be paid by an Employer pursuant to a Relocation Services Agreement
for application to existing or future Receivables with respect to an
Origination Home.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Adverse Claim&#148;</font></i> means, for any asset or
property of a Person, a lien, security interest, charge, mortgage, pledge,
hypothecation, assignment or encumbrance, or any other right or claim, in, of
or on such asset or property in favor of any other Person, except those in
favor of the Agent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Affiliate&#148;</font></i> means, for any Person, any other
Person which, directly or indirectly, is in control of, is controlled by, or is
under common control with such Person.&#160;
For purposes of this definition, <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;control&#148;</font></i> means
the power, directly or indirectly, to either (i)&nbsp;vote ten percent (10%) or
more of the securities having ordinary voting power for the election of
directors of a Person or (ii)&nbsp;cause the direction of the management and
policies of a Person.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Aged Receivables Ratio&#148;</font></i> means, as of any
date, the ratio of (a) the aggregate outstanding balance of all Receivables as
to which the Disqualification Date has occurred to (b)&nbsp;the aggregate
outstanding balance of all Receivables as of such date.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Agent&#148; </font></i>is defined in the first paragraph
hereof.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Aggregate Commitment&#148;</font></i> means the aggregate of
all Commitments of each Purchaser, as such amount may be reduced pursuant to
Section&nbsp;1.5.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Aggregate Investment&#148;</font></i> means the sum of the
Investments of all Purchasers.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Applicable Base Margin&#148;</font></i> means at any time the
percentage set forth below opposite the Consolidated Leverage Ratio most
recently reported (or required to be reported) by parent and its Subsidiaries
under the SIRVA Credit Agreement, as such agreement is in effect on the date
hereof.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="85%" style="border-collapse:collapse;margin-left:.5in;width:85.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="56%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:56.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CONSOLIDATED LEVERAGE<br>
  RATIO</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.48%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.68%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">PRIME</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="bottom" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.42%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EURODOLLAR RATE</font></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.16%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><b><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</font></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="56%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:56.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 10.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">greater than
  or equal to 1.75</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.48%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.68%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.75</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.42%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.00</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.16%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="56%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:56.44%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">less than
  1.75</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.48%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="16%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:16.68%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">0.50</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.84%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="19%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:19.42%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.50</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.16%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>

</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-1',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Applicable Margin&#148;</font></i> a rate per annum equal to
the sum of (a) the Applicable Base Margin, plus (b) on and after December 31,
2005, 0.25% so long as less than 30% of the Eligible Receivables Balance
consists of Eligible Receivables arising under Securitizable Relocation
Services Agreements, plus (c) on and after December 31, 2006, 0.50% so long as
less than 70% of the Eligible Receivables Balance consists of Eligible
Receivables arising under Securitizable Relocation Services Agreements.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Appraised Value&#148;</font></i> with respect to an
Origination Home means the &#147;fair market value&#148; thereof for purposes of an Origination
Home Purchase Contract as determined in accordance with the applicable
Relocation Services Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Available Funds&#148;</font></i> means, with respect to any
date, the sum of the following amounts, without duplication:&#160; (i) all Collections received by the Seller or
any Servicer, or otherwise deposited in the Collection Account or the
Investment Account, and not yet applied pursuant to the terms hereof, (ii) all
income from investment or amounts held in the Collection Account or the
Investment Account, and (iii) all other proceeds of the Receivables, to the
extent received by the Seller, any Servicer, any Purchaser or the Agent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Bailment Agreement&#148;</font></i> means a bailment and
control agreement among an Originator, the Seller and the Agent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Bankruptcy Event&#148;</font></i> means, for any Person, that
(a)&nbsp;such Person makes a general assignment for the benefit of creditors or
any proceeding is instituted by or against such Person seeking to adjudicate it
bankrupt or insolvent, or seeking the liquidation, winding up, reorganization,
arrangement, adjustment, protection, relief or composition of it or its debts
under any law relating to bankruptcy, insolvency or reorganization or relief of
debtors, or seeking the entry of an order for relief or the appointment of a
receiver, trustee or other similar official for it or any substantial part of
its property or (b)&nbsp;such Person takes any corporate action to authorize
any such action.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Billed Receivable&#148;</font></i> means any Receivable which
has been billed to an Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;BofA&#148;</font></i> means Bank of America, N.A.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;BofA Box/Account&#148;</font></i> means BofA account number
00500 and any related lockbox.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Budget&#148; </font></i>&#160;means, with respect to each Originator, an
annual budget substantially in the form of annual budget prepared and delivered
by Parent to its lenders under the SIRVA Credit Agreement in 2004.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Business Day&#148;</font></i> means any day other than
(a)&nbsp;a Saturday, Sunday or other day on which banks in Chicago, Illinois
are authorized or required to close, (b)&nbsp;a holiday on the Federal Reserve
calendar and (c)&nbsp;solely for matters relating to a Eurodollar Tranche, a
day on which dealings in Dollars are not carried on in the London interbank
market.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Charge-Off&#148;</font></i> means any Receivable that has or
should have been (in accordance with the related Credit and Collection Policy)
charged-off or written-off by the Seller for reasons relating to the bad credit
of the related Obligor.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-2',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Code&#148;</font></i> means the Internal Revenue Code of
1986, as amended from time to time.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Collection&#148;</font></i> means any amount paid, or deemed
paid, on a Receivable, including, without limitation, (i) the proceeds of the
sale of an Origination Home and other proceeds of Related Assets, (ii) by the
Seller under Section&nbsp;1.4(b), or (iii) by an Originator under Section 3.2
of the Purchase Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Collection Account&#148;</font></i> means, collectively,
those certain segregated deposit accounts number 5800691387 and 5800691742
maintained by the Agent in the name of the Agent, or such other account as is
designated by the Agent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Commitment&#148;</font></i> means, for each Purchaser, the
amount set forth on Schedule&nbsp;II for such Purchaser, in each case as
adjusted in accordance with Sections&nbsp;1.5 and 9.8.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Commitment Percentage&#148;</font></i> means, for each
Purchaser, the Commitment for such Purchaser divided by the Commitment of all
Purchasers.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Commonly Controlled Entity&#148;</font></i> means an entity,
whether or not incorporated, which is under common control with the Parent
within the meaning of Section 4001 of ERISA or is part of a group which
includes the Parent and which is treated as a single employer under Section 414
of the Code.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Concentration Limit&#148;</font></i> means (i) for a Special
Obligor, its Special Obligor Limit, and (ii)&nbsp;for Employers other than
Special Obligors, the percentages of the Eligible Receivables Balance set forth
in the table below based upon the higher of the long-term unsecured senior debt
ratings of such Obligors from Moody&#146;s or S&amp;P:</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.5%;">

  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.48%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="27%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:27.92%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="2%" valign="bottom" bgcolor="#CCEEFF" style="background:#CCEEFF;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:2.16%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">%</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If one or more Obligors has the same parent company, or is a Subsidiary
of another Obligor, the Receivables of such Obligors shall be considered as
Receivables of the parent company for the purpose of calculating its
Concentration Limit.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Consent to Assignment&#148;</font></i> means a consent to
assignment, in form and substance satisfactory to the Required Purchasers,
executed by an Included Employer with respect to the transactions contemplated
hereby.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-3',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Contract Date&#148;</font></i> means, with respect to any
Origination Home, the date of acceptance of the related Origination Home
Purchase Contract by the related Originator and the related Relocating
Employee.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Credit and Collection Policy&#148;</font></i> means the
credit and collection policy and practices relating to Receivables attached
hereto as Exhibit&nbsp;G.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Custodian&#148;</font></i> is defined in Section 2.1(a).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Deemed Collections&#148; </font></i>is defined in
Section&nbsp;1.4(c).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Default Ratio&#148;</font></i> means, for any calendar month,
the ratio of (a)&nbsp;the aggregate outstanding balance of all Defaulted
Receivables as of the end of such calendar month to (b)&nbsp;the aggregate
outstanding balance of all Receivables as of the end of such calendar month.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Defaulted Receivable&#148;</font></i> means any Receivable
(a)&nbsp;as to which the Disqualification Date has occurred, (b)&nbsp;any
Obligor on which has suffered a Bankruptcy Event or ceased to be an Eligible
Employer or (c) is a Charge-Off.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Designated Financial Officer&#148;</font></i> means the
President, Vice President, Chief Financial Officer, Treasurer or Chief
Operating Officer of the relevant SIRVA Entity, as applicable.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Destination Home&#148; </font></i>means an Eligible Home to
which an Relocating Employee is moving as part of his or her relocation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Dilution Ratio&#148;</font></i> means, as for any date which
it is calculated, the ratio of (a)&nbsp;the average aggregate amount of
payments owed by the Seller pursuant to the first sentence of
Section&nbsp;1.4(b) as of the last day of each of the most recent calendar
month ending prior to such date to (b)&nbsp;the average aggregate outstanding
balance of all Receivables as of the end of such calendar month.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Discount&#148; </font></i>means, for any Tranche Period,
(a)&nbsp;the product of&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;the Discount Rate for such Tranche
Period, (ii)&nbsp;the total amount of Investment allocated to the Tranche
Period, and (iii)&nbsp;the number of days elapsed during the Tranche Period
divided by (b)&nbsp;360 days.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Discount Period&#148; </font></i>means, with respect to any
Settlement Date or the Termination Date, the period from and including the
preceding Settlement Date (or if none, the date that the first Incremental
Purchase is made hereunder) to but not including such Settlement Date or
Termination Date, as applicable.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Discount Rate&#148;</font></i> means, for any Tranche Period,
the Eurodollar Rate or the Prime Rate.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Disqualification Date&#148;</font></i> means, (a)&nbsp;with
respect to any Miscellaneous Receivable, the Outside Date and (b)&nbsp;with
respect to any other Receivable, the earlier to occur of (x) any applicable
Outside Date, and (y) the day on which the related Origination Home is sold to
any Person, other than an Originator; <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font></i> that
if a portion of a Receivable remains owing by the related Employer following
the closing of the sale of the related Origination Home and such portion of
such Receivable becomes a Billed Receivable to the related Employer within five
Business Days following the closing of such sale (and has not previously been
classified as a</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-4</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-4',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Billed Receivable), then the Disqualification
Date for such portion of such Receivable shall be the originally applicable
Outside Date for such Receivable.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Document Schedule&#148;</font></i> means a schedule in the
form of Exhibit A-2, which schedule shall include (i) name of each Relocating
Employee and type of each Receivable to be added to the Net Receivables
Balance, (ii) the related Relocation Services Agreement, and (iii) the current
contact information for the related Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Dollar&#148;</font></i> and <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;$&#148;</font></i>
means lawful currency of the United States of America.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Early Payment Fee&#148;</font></i> means, if any Investment
of a Purchaser allocated (or, in the case of a requested Purchase not made by
the Purchasers for any reason other than their default, scheduled to be
allocated) to a Tranche Period for a Eurodollar Tranche is reduced or
terminated before the last day of such Tranche Period (the amount of Investment
so reduced or terminated being referred to as the <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;Prepaid
Amount&#148;),</font></i> the cost to the relevant Purchaser of terminating or
reducing such Tranche, which for a Eurodollar Tranche will be determined based
on the difference between the LIBOR applicable to such Tranche and the LIBOR
applicable for a period equal to the remaining maturity of the Tranche on the
date the Prepaid Amount is received.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eligible Employer&#148;</font></i> means an Included
Employer; <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font></i> that any Employer shall cease
to be an Eligible Employer if (i) any Receivable to which it is an Obligor
shall have become a Charge-off, (ii) more than 50% of the Receivables as to
which it is an Obligor shall at any time remain unpaid past their
Disqualification Dates, (iii) such Employer (if other than Federal Mogal
Corporation or USG Corporation) has suffered a Bankruptcy Event, or (iv) in the
case of any Employer listed on <i><font style="font-style:italic;">Schedule IV</font></i>,
the corrective action described opposite the name of such Employer in such
schedule shall not have been taken by the date specified in such schedule; and <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided further</font></i> that the Agent may determine, in its sole
discretion upon notice to the Seller, that any Employer shall no longer be an
Eligible Employer with respect to any additional Receivables that might
otherwise be proposed to be included in Eligible Receivables following such
determination by the Agent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eligible Home&#148;</font></i> is a one or two-family
principal residence owned by the related Relocating Employee of an Eligible
Employer as to which the related Originator has agreed to provide home
marketing assistance; <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font></i> that
such residence must be within the United States, and such residence is not any
of the following (unless approved by the Agent): income producing property,
resort property, mobile home, cooperative unit, farm, home with acreage in
excess of five acres or acreage that does not conform to the immediate area,
property on which clear title cannot be delivered, property which does not
qualify for conventional mortgage financing, property containing or located by
hazardous materials, vacant land, residence that is not Fannie Mae approved or
income property other than two-family dwellings, property that has EFS/synthetic
stucco exterior finishing, and property in which an inspection by the related
Originator disclosed defects which render the property unmarketable if the
Relocating Employee does not repair such defects in a manner satisfactory to
the related Originator.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-5</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-5',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eligible Receivable&#148;</font></i> means, at any time, any
Receivable:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>each Obligor of
which (A)&nbsp;is a resident of, or organized under the laws of with its chief
executive office in, the United States; (B) is not an Affiliate of any of the
parties hereto or an Originator; (C)&nbsp;is not a government or a governmental
subdivision or agency; and (D)&nbsp;is either an Eligible Relocating Employee
or an Eligible Employer in good standing;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which is stated to be
due and payable by the Disqualification Date therefor, and as to which the
Disqualification Date has not occurred;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which is not a Defaulted
Receivable or a Charge-Off;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which is an <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;account&#148;</font></i>, <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;payment intangible&#148;</font></i>
or <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;chattel paper&#148;</font></i> within the meaning of
Section&nbsp;9-105 and Section&nbsp;9-106, respectively of the UCC of all
applicable jurisdictions;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which is denominated
and payable only in Dollars in the United States;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which arises in respect
of an Equity Advance, a Final Equity Payment, a Mortgage Payment or (with
respect to Receivables originated by Executive Relo) a Miscellaneous
Receivable, in each case related to an Eligible Home and an Eligible Relocating
Employee under an Eligible Relocation Services Agreement and (in the case of an
Equity Advance) an Eligible Relocating Employee Contract, each of which is in
full force and effect and constitutes the legal, valid and binding obligation
of the related Obligor enforceable against such Obligor in accordance with its
terms subject to no counterclaim, defense or other Adverse Claim (other than
Permitted Exceptions), and is not an executory contract or unexpired lease
within the meaning of Section&nbsp;365 of the Bankruptcy Code;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>as to which the related
Originator has performed all of its obligations then required to be performed
under the related Relocating Employee Contract and Relocation Services
Agreement;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which arises under an Eligible
Relocating Employee Contract and an Eligible Relocation Services Agreement,
each of which (A)&nbsp;contains an obligation to pay a specified sum of money
and is subject to no contingencies, (B)&nbsp;except for Permitted Exceptions,
does not require the Obligor under such contract to consent to the transfer,
sale or assignment of the rights to payment under such contract, (C)&nbsp;does
not contain a confidentiality provision that purports to restrict any Purchaser&#146;s
exercise of rights under this Agreement, including, without limitation, the
right to review such contract, and (D) as to which the Seller is in compliance
with its obligations under Section 5.2(k) (if applicable);</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ix)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>as to which, if it is a
Relocating Employee Receivable, the related Employer is fully obligated to pay
the Relocating Employee Receivable through a guaranty, loss indemnity or
reimbursement obligation under the related Relocation Services Agreement;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-6</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-6',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(x)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which does not, in
whole or in part, contravene any law, rule or regulation applicable thereto
(including those relating to usury, truth in lending, fair credit billing, fair
credit reporting, equal credit opportunity, fair debt collection practices and
privacy), which contravention would reasonably be expected to have a Material
Adverse Effect;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which satisfies in all
material respects all applicable requirements of the Credit and Collection
Policy and was generated in the ordinary course of the related Originator&#146;s
business;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>as to which the related
Specified Documents have been delivered to a Custodian, and the Document
Schedule has been delivered to the Agent and the Custodian, in accordance with
Section 2.1;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xiii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which has not been extended,
amended, rescinded or cancelled;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xiv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which is not subject to any
asserted reduction (including, without limitation, any reduction on account of
any offsetting account payable of the related Originator or the Seller to an
Obligor, any Advance Employer Payment made by the relevant Obligor),
cancellation, rebate or refund or any dispute, offset, counterclaim, lien or
defense whatsoever; <u>provided</u> that a Receivable that is subject only in
part to any of the foregoing but otherwise qualifies as an Eligible Receivable
shall be an Eligible Receivable to the extent not subject to reduction,
cancellation, refund, dispute, offset, counterclaim, lien or other defense; and</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;text-indent:.25in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>as to which the applicable
Originator has taken all actions required under Sections&nbsp;5.4 and 5.5 of
the Purchase Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .25in;text-align:left;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eligible Receivables Balance&#148;</font></i> means, at any
time, the aggregate outstanding principal balance of all Receivables included
in the Eligible Receivables.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eligible Relocating Employee&#148; </font></i>means a
Relocating Employee who (i) is eligible for an extension of credit under the
Credit and Collection Policy, (ii) has the legal capacity to enter into a
binding contract, and (iii) to the knowledge of the Servicer and the Seller, is
not the subject of a Bankruptcy Event.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eligible Relocating Employee Contract&#148;</font></i> means
a Relocating Employee Contract prepared, completed and executed under an
Eligible Relocation Services Agreement, and relating to an Origination Home
that is an Eligible Home, in accordance with (i) forms delivered to the Agent
prior to the date hereof, (ii) the Credit and Collection Policy and (iii) the
related Eligible Relocation Services Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eligible Relocation Services Agreement&#148;</font></i>
means, at any time, a Relocation Services Agreement</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i) which is
listed on Schedule III;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which
has been duly executed and delivered by the relevant Included Employer, has not
expired or terminated in accordance with its terms and is otherwise in full
force and effect;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-7</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-7',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>(subject
to the Permitted Exceptions) the rights to payment under which are assignable
without the consent of the Employer party thereto or any other Person (other
than the related Originator), other than any such consent which has been
obtained and remains in effect;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>under
which all Billed Receivables are payable by the Employer (a) in the case of a
Receivable originated by SIRVA Relo, not later than 60 days after the original
date of the relevant invoice, and (b) in the case of a Receivable originated by
Executive Relo, not later than 30 days after the original date of the related
invoice; and</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>which
does not (A)&nbsp;provide for the grant of any Lien on any Origination Home or
other Related Assets to the related Employer or any other Person, (B) prohibit
the related Originator from granting a Lien on its interest in any Origination
Home covered thereby, or (C) otherwise conflict with any of the transactions
contemplated by the Transaction Documents.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eligible Title Company&#148; </font></i>means a title company
approved by the Required Purchasers that has executed and delivered to the
Agent a bailment and control agreement in form and substance satisfactory to
the Required Purchasers, provided that such agreement remains in full force and
effect.&#160; For purposes of this definition,
agents selected by such title company, and for which such title company takes
responsibility in accordance with the terms of such bailment and control
agreement, shall be deemed to satisfy the requirements of this definition.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Employer&#148; </font></i>means an employer or other Person
(other than an individual) providing credit, liquidity or other support to the
payment of an Relocating Employee Receivable.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Employer Receivable&#148; </font></i>&#160;means each obligation of an Employer to make
payments under an Included Relocation Services Agreement, including without
limitation any Miscellaneous Receivable and any obligation to guarantee payment
of a Relocating Employee Receivable, or to make payments in respect of any
Equity Advance, Final Equity Payment, Mortgage Payment or Loss on Sale or other
shortfall in the payment of such Relocating Employee Receivable following the
disposition of any Origination Home, and any obligation to pay interest in
respect of any of the foregoing.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Equity Advance&#148; </font></i>means a loan made by the
related Originator to a Relocating Employee to fund the down payment on the
Destination Home prior to the closing of the sale on the Origination Home.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;ERISA&#148; </font></i>means the Employee Retirement Income
Security Act of 1974, as amended from time to time.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eurodollar Rate&#148;</font></i> means for any Tranche Period
for a Eurodollar Tranche, the sum of (a)&nbsp;LIBOR for such Tranche Period
divided by 1 minus the <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;Reserve Requirement&#148;</font></i>
plus (b)&nbsp;the Applicable Margin plus (c)&nbsp;on or after the occurrence of
a Termination Event or in any event after December 31, 2007, 2.0%; where <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;Reserve Requirement&#148;</font></i> means, for any Tranche Period for a
Eurodollar Tranche, the maximum reserve requirement imposed during such Tranche
Period on <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;eurocurrency liabilities&#148;</font></i> as currently
defined in Regulation D of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve
System.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-8',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Eurodollar Tranche&#148;</font></i> is defined in the
definition of &#147;Tranche&#148;.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Excluded Receivable&#148;</font></i> means, with respect to
an Employer that has been identified to the Agent and the Purchasers in a
written notice as described in the proviso to the definition of Included
Employer, the following:&#160; (i) a Relocating
Employee Receivable arising after the related Exclusion Date (as defined in
such proviso), provided that no other payment obligation of, or relating to,
the related Relocating Employee is then included in the Eligible Receivables
Balance, and (ii) Employer Receivables that relate solely to such Relocating
Employee.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Executive Relo&#148;</font></i> is defined in the first
paragraph hereof.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Federal Funds Rate&#148;</font></i> for any day the greater
of (i)&nbsp;the highest rate per annum as determined by LaSalle at which
overnight Federal funds are offered to LaSalle for such day by major banks in
the interbank market, and (ii)&nbsp;if LaSalle is borrowing overnight funds
from a Federal Reserve Bank that day, the highest rate per annum at which such
overnight borrowings are made on that day.&#160;
Each determination of the Federal Funds Rate by LaSalle shall be
conclusive and binding on the Seller except in the case of manifest error.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Fee Letter&#148;</font></i> means the letter agreement
between the SIRVA Entities and the Agent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Final Equity Payment&#148;</font></i> is a payment to a
Relocating Employee of an amount equal to the excess, if any, of (i) the Sale
Contract Price for such Relocating Employee&#146;s Origination Home minus (ii) the
amount owed in respect of any Adverse Claims (including mortgages and deeds of
trust) on such Origination Home minus (iii) the outstanding balance of any
Equity Advances in respect of such Origination Home, <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided </font></i>that
the related Originator shall be entitled to be reimbursed for the amount of
such payment by the related Employer under the terms of an Eligible Relocation
Services Agreement.&#160; For the avoidance of
doubt, it is understood and agreed that a Relocation Services Agreement
(whether or not an Eligible Relocation Services Agreement) that would be
characterized as a &#147;fixed fee&#148; arrangement in accordance with the Master
Servicer&#146;s customary practices prior to the date hereof does not give rise to
such a reimbursement obligation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Former Plan&#148; </font></i>means any employee benefit plan
in respect of which the Parent or a Commonly Controlled Entity has engaged in a
transaction described in Section 4069 or Section&nbsp;4212(c) of ERISA.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;GAAP&#148;</font></i> means generally accepted accounting
principles in the USA, applied on a consistent basis.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Governmental Authority&#148;</font></i> means any
(a)&nbsp;Federal, state, municipal or other governmental entity, board, bureau,
agency or instrumentality, (b)&nbsp;administrative or regulatory authority
(including any central bank or similar authority) or (c)&nbsp;court, judicial
authority or arbitrator, in each case, whether foreign or domestic.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Guaranty&#148;</font></i> means the Amended and Restated
