Guaranty, dated as of the date hereof, from the Parent and NAVL for the benefit
of Seller and its assignees, as the same may be amended or modified in
accordance with its terms.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-9</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-9',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Included Employer&#148; </font></i>means an Employer listed
in Schedule III; provided that, with respect to any such Employer, the
Originators may designate an Employer for which no Excluded Receivables will be
sold to Seller after a specified date (the <i><font style="font-style:italic;">&#147;Exclusion Date&#148;</font></i>),
provided that (i) the Originators shall have given the Agent and the Purchasers
at least 15 Business Days&#146; prior written notice thereof, (ii) the Servicers and
the Sellers shall have the systems capability to exclude such Excluded
Receivables from subsequent reports and other information provided to the Agent
and the Purchasers, and (iii) the Agent and the Required Purchasers shall have
consented to the exclusion of such Excluded Receivables prior to giving effect
thereto.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Included Relocation Services Agreement&#148;</font></i> means
any Relocation Services Agreement with an Included Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Incremental Purchase&#148;</font></i>&#160; is defined in Section&nbsp;1.1(b).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Incremental Purchase Request&#148;</font></i>&#160; is defined in Section 1.1(c).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Insolvency&#148; </font></i>means with respect to any Multiemployer
Plan, the condition that such Plan is insolvent within the meaning of Section
4245 of ERISA.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Investment&#148; </font></i>means, for each Purchaser, such
Purchaser&#146;s Ratable Share of the Original Interest plus all Incremental
Purchases by such Purchaser and other amounts received or exchanged and, in
each case, applied by the Agent or such Purchaser to reduce such Purchaser&#146;s
Investment.&#160; A Purchaser&#146;s Investment
shall be restored to the extent any amounts so received or exchanged and
applied are rescinded or must be returned for any reason.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Investment Account&#148;</font></i> means account number
5800691403 maintained by LaSalle, as securities intermediary, in the name of the
Agent, or such other account designated by the Agent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;LaSalle&#148;</font></i> means LaSalle Bank National
Association in its individual capacity and not in its capacity as the Agent.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;LIBOR&#148;</font></i> means, for any Tranche Period for a
Eurodollar Tranche or other time period, the rate per annum (rounded upwards,
if necessary, to the next higher one sixteenth of a percentage point) for
deposits in Dollars for a period equal to such Tranche Period or other period,
which appears on Page 3750 of the Telerate Service (or any successor page or
successor service that displays the British Bankers&#146; Association Interest
Settlement Rates for Dollar deposits) as of 11:00&nbsp;a.m. (London, England
time) two Business Days before the commencement of such Tranche Period or other
period.&#160; If for any Tranche Period for a
Eurodollar Tranche no such displayed rate is available (or, for any other
period, if such displayed rate is not available or the need to calculate LIBOR
is not notified to the Agent at least two Business Days before the commencement
of the period for which it is to be determined), the Agent shall determine such
rate based on the rates the Agent is offered on deposits of such duration in
the London interbank market.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Liquidation Period&#148;</font></i> means all times on and
after the Termination Date.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-10</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-10',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Lock Box&#148;</font></i> means each post office box or bank
box to which Obligors are directed to send payments on Receivables.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Lock-Box Account&#148;</font></i> means each deposit account
maintained by the Seller or a Servicer at a bank for the purpose of receiving
or concentrating Collections.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Lock-Box Agreement&#148; </font></i>means an agreement with a
Lock-Box Bank, in form and substance satisfactory to the Agent, under which the
Agent controls the Lock-Box and Lock-Box Accounts at such Lock-Box Bank.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Lock-Box Bank&#148;</font></i> means a bank at which a
Lock-Box Account and/or Lock-Box is located.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Loss on Sale&#148;</font></i> means, with respect to any
Origination Home, the excess of (a) the contract purchase price for such
Origination Home under the applicable Origination Home Purchase Contract over
(b)&nbsp;the purchase price paid by or on behalf of the Origination Home Buyer
of such Home under the applicable Origination Home Sale Contract.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Master Servicer&#148;</font></i> is defined in the first
paragraph hereof.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Material Adverse Effect&#148;</font></i> means an adverse
effect on (i) any SIRVA Entity&#146;s ability to perform its obligations under or in
connection with, or the enforceability of, any Transaction Document,
(ii)&nbsp;any SIRVA Entity&#146;s business, financial condition or prospects,
(iii)&nbsp;the interests of the Agent or any Purchaser under or in connection
with any Transaction Document or (iv)&nbsp;the enforceability or collectibility
of any Receivable.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Matured Aggregate Investment&#148;</font></i> means, at any
time, the sum of the Matured Values of all Investments of all Purchasers then
outstanding.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Matured Value&#148;</font></i> means, of any Investment, the
sum of such Investment and all unpaid Discount, fees and other amounts
scheduled to become due (whether or not then due) on such Investment during all
Tranche Periods to which any portion of such Investment has been allocated.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Maximum Incremental Purchase Amount&#148;</font></i> means,
at any time, the difference between the Purchase Limit and the Aggregate
Investment then outstanding.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Miscellaneous Receivable&#148; </font></i>means an Employer
Receivable originated by Executive Relo in connection with (i) the sale of the
Origination Home, including without limitation, home sale commissions, title
costs and appraisal costs, (ii) the Relocating Employee&#146;s move to the
Destination Home, including without limitation, expenses relating to locating a
Destination Home, travel expenses, the cost of shipping household goods and
vehicles and any lump sum moving allowances, and (iii) any other home sale and
moving expense paid to the Relocating Employee based on the related Included
Employer&#146;s relocation policies.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Monthly Report&#148;</font></i> is defined in
Section&nbsp;3.3.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-11</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-11',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Monthly Reporting Date&#148;</font></i> means the second
Business Day immediately prior to each Settlement Date.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Moody&#146;s&#148; </font></i>means Moody&#146;s Investors Service,
Inc.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Mortgage Payment&#148;</font></i> means an advance made by
the related Originator to repay a borrowing by a Relocating Employee secured by
such Relocating Employee&#146;s Origination Home, <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font></i>
that the related Originator shall be entitled to be reimbursed for the amount
of such payment by the related Employer under the terms of an Eligible
Relocation Services Agreement.&#160; For the
avoidance of doubt, it is understood and agreed that a Relocation Services
Agreement (whether or not an Eligible Relocation Services Agreement) that would
be characterized as a &#147;fixed fee&#148; arrangement in accordance with the customary
practices employed by the Master Servicer prior to the date hereof does not
give rise to such a reimbursement obligation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Multiemployer Plan&#148; </font></i>means a Plan which is a
multiemployer plan as defined in Section&nbsp;4001(a)(3) of ERISA.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;NAVL&#148; </font></i>means North American Van Lines, Inc., a
Delaware corporation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Net Receivables Balance&#148;</font></i> means at any time
(a)&nbsp;the Eligible Receivables Balance minus (b)&nbsp;the sum of the
following amounts, as determined without duplication as of the most recent Weekly
Reporting Date, (i)&nbsp;the portion of the Eligible Receivable Balance in
excess of the Concentration Limit for each Employer, (ii) the Unbilled
Miscellaneous Receivable Excess Concentration, and (iii)&nbsp;all unapplied
Advance Employer Payments.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Obligor&#148;</font></i> means a Relocating Employee or an
Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Original Purchase and Sale Agreement&#148; </font></i>is
defined in the Purchase Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Original Receivables Sale Agreement&#148;</font></i> is
defined in the recitals.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Origination Home&#148;</font></i> is an Eligible Home from
which a Relocating Employee is moving in connection with his or her relocation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Origination Home Buyer&#148;</font></i> means the buyer
(other than an Originator) of an Origination Home from the Relocating Employee
or an Originator, as the case may be.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Origination Home Closing Agent&#148;</font></i> means, with
respect to any Origination Home, the title insurance company, closing company
or lawyer acting for the Servicer in connection with the resale of such
Origination Home.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Origination Home Deed&#148;</font></i> means, with respect to
any Origination Home, a deed or other instrument of conveyance executed by the
related Relocating Employee that effects the conveyance of such Origination
Home pursuant to the related Origination Home Purchase Contract.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-12</font></p>

<div align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-12',FILE='C:\JMS\jpatrow\04-14642-3\task264875\14642-3-mm-05.htm',USER='jpatrow',CD='Dec 29 14:06 2004' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">

<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Origination Homes in Inventory&#148;</font></i> means an
Origination Home which is subject to an executed Origination Home Purchase
Contract between the Relocating Employee and an Originator and which has not
yet been sold (or the sale of which has not been closed or the proceeds of
which have not been received) under an Origination Home Sale Contract.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Origination Home Purchase Contract&#148;</font></i> means the
contract by which the related Originator purchases an Origination Home from a
Relocating Employee.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Origination Home Sale Contract&#148;</font></i> means the
contract by which the related Originator sells an Origination Home to an
Origination Home Buyer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Originator&#148;</font></i> means each of SIRVA Relo and
Executive Relo.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Outside Date&#148;</font></i>
means:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>with
respect to any Equity Advance, Final Equity Payment or Mortgage Payment, the
earlier of (i) 180 days following the funding of such Equity Advance, Final
Equity Payment or Mortgage Payment by the related Originator and (ii) if the
related Receivable is a Billed Receivable, the date specified in clause (b) or
(c) below, as applicable;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>with
respect to a Billed Receivable originated by SIRVA Relo, 90 days following the
date of invoice for such Billed Receivable;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>with
respect to a Billed Receivable originated by Executive Relo, 60 days following
the due date for such Billed Receivable; and</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>with
respect to an Unbilled Miscellaneous Receivable, 30 days after the services
giving rise to such Receivable have been performed.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Parent&#148;</font></i> means SIRVA Worldwide, Inc., a
Delaware corporation.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Payment Date&#148;</font></i> means Weekly Funding Date, a
Settlement Date and any other Business Day on which Available Funds are on
deposit in the Collection Account.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;PBGC&#148; </font></i>means the Pension Benefit Guaranty
Corporation established pursuant to Subtitle&nbsp;A of Title&nbsp;IV of ERISA
(or any successor thereto).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Permitted Exceptions&#148;</font></i> means any of the
following:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i) delay in
the recording of a deed, mortgage or deed of trust that has been delivered to a
Servicer in connection with an Relocating Employee Receivable so long as a
Recording Trigger Event has not occurred;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii) failure
of the Seller and the Servicers to deliver to the Custodian an executed
original Relocating Employee Note evidencing an Equity Advance so long as (A)
with respect to any Relocating Employee Receivable originated after June&nbsp;25,
2004, the time elapsed since the origination of such Relocating Employee
Receivables does not exceed five Business Days, and (B) a Recording Trigger
Event has not occurred;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-13</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-13',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>failure
of a Custodian to hold the deeds described in clause (ii) of the definition of
Specified Documents, <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font></i> that
such deeds are held by an Origination Home Closing Agent that has received the
letter described in clause (viii) of such definition; and</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
inclusion of restrictions on assignment in an Included Relocation Services
Agreement, <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font></i> that (A) such restriction does
not preclude the legal, valid and binding assignment of rights to payment to
the Agent and the Purchasers, and (B) if applicable, the Seller is in
compliance with its obligations under Section&nbsp;5.2(k) with respect thereto.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Permitted Investments&#148;</font></i> means
(a)&nbsp;evidences of indebtedness issued by, or guaranteed by the full faith
and credit of, the federal government of the United States, (b)&nbsp;repurchase
agreements with banking institutions or broker-dealers the short term unsecured
indebtedness of which is rated at least &#147;A-1+&#148; (or the equivalent) by S&amp;P
and at least &#147;P-1&#148; (or the equivalent) by Moody&#146;s registered under the Securities
Exchange Act of 1934 which are fully secured by obligations of the kind
specified in clause (a), (c)&nbsp;money market funds (i)&nbsp;rated not lower
than the highest rating category from Moody&#146;s and &#147;AAA m&#148; or &#147;AAAm-g,&#148; from
S&amp;P or (ii)&nbsp;which are otherwise acceptable to the Rating Agencies or
(d)&nbsp;commercial paper issued by any corporation incorporated under the laws
of the USA and rated at least &#147;A-1+&#148; (or the equivalent) by S&amp;P and at
least &#147;P-1&#148; (or the equivalent) by Moody&#146;s.&#160;
All Permitted Investments must (1)&nbsp;be denominated and payable only
in Dollars, (2)&nbsp;not have an &#147;r&#148; designation if rated by S&amp;P, and
(3)&nbsp;must mature (A) within thirty (30) days after the date of purchase
thereof or (B)&nbsp;by the date on which the funds so invested are needed in
order to make any payment required hereunder.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Person&#148;</font></i> means an individual, partnership,
corporation, association, joint venture, Governmental Authority or other entity
of any kind.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Plan&#148; </font></i>means at a particular time, any
employee benefit plan which is covered by ERISA and in respect of which the
Parent or a Commonly Controlled Entity is an &#147;employer&#148; as defined in Section&nbsp;3(5)
of ERISA.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Potential Termination Event&#148;</font></i> means any
Termination Event or any event or condition that with the lapse of time or
giving of notice, or both, would constitute a Termination Event.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Prime Rate&#148;</font></i> means for any period, the daily
average during such period of (a) the greater of (i)&nbsp;the floating
commercial lending rate per annum of LaSalle (which rate is a reference rate
and does not necessarily represent the lowest or best rate actually charged to
any customer by LaSalle) announced from time to time as its prime rate or
equivalent for Dollar loans in the United States, changing as and when said
rate changes and (ii)&nbsp;the Federal Funds Rate plus 0.75% plus (b) the
Applicable Margin plus (c) on or after the occurrence of a Termination Event or
in any event after December&nbsp;31, 2007, 2%.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Prime Tranche&#148;</font></i> is defined in the definition
of &#147;Tranche&#148;.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-14</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-14',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Principal Distribution Amount&#148;</font></i> means, with
respect to any Business Day, the sum of (i)&nbsp;85% of Available Funds
deposited in the Collection Account since the immediately preceding Payment
Date (or, in the case of the first Payment Date, the date hereof), to the
extent such funds represent the payment on, or return of, principal on the
Receivables, plus (ii) all amounts required to be paid by the Seller pursuant
to Section&nbsp;1.4(a) and 1.4(b) but not yet paid.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Purchase&#148;</font></i> is defined in Section&nbsp;1.1(a).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Purchase Agreement&#148;</font></i> means the Amended and
Restated Purchase and Sale Agreement dated as of the date hereof between the
Seller and the Originators, as the same may be amended or modified in
accordance with its terms and the terms hereof.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Purchase Date&#148;</font></i> is defined in Section&nbsp;1.1(c).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Purchase Interest&#148;</font></i> means, for a Purchaser,
the percentage ownership interest in the Receivables, the Collections and
proceeds thereof held by such Purchaser, calculated when and as described in Section&nbsp;1.1(a);
<i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided, however, </font></i>that (except for
purposes of computing a Purchase Interest or the Sold Interest in Section&nbsp;1.4
(or 1.7)) at any time the Sold Interest would otherwise exceed 100% each
Purchaser then holding any Investment shall have its Purchase Interest reduced
by multiplying such Purchase Interest by a fraction equal to 100% divided by
the Sold Interest otherwise then in effect, so that the Sold Interest is
thereby reduced to 100%.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Purchase Limit&#148;</font></i> means $200,000,000.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Purchaser&#148;</font></i> means LaSalle and each other
Person that becomes a Purchaser pursuant to a Transfer Supplement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Purchaser Reserve&#148;</font></i> means, for each Purchaser,
an amount obtained by multiplying the Reserve by the outstanding Investment of
such Purchaser at such time.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Ratable Share&#148; </font></i>means, for each Purchaser,
such Purchaser&#146;s Commitment divided by the aggregate Commitments of all
Purchasers.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Rating Agencies&#148;</font></i> means S&amp;P and Moody&#146;s.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Receivable&#148;</font></i> means a Relocating Employee
Receivable, taken together with the Employer Receivables under the related
Included Relocation Services Agreement and all Related Assets with respect
thereto; provided that the outstanding balance thereof shall be determined
without duplication.<b><i><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">&#160; </font></i></b>Deemed
Collections shall reduce the outstanding balance of Receivables hereunder, so
that any Receivable that has its outstanding balance deemed collected shall
cease to be a Receivable hereunder after (x)&nbsp;the Servicer receives payment
of such Deemed Collections under Section&nbsp;1.4(b) or (y)&nbsp;if such Deemed
Collection is received before the Termination Date, an adjustment to the Sold
Interest permitted by Section&nbsp;1.4(c) is made.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Receivables Balance&#148;</font></i> means, at any time, the
aggregate outstanding principal amount of all Receivables sold by the Seller
hereunder.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Recording Trigger Event&#148;</font></i> means a Servicer
Replacement Event.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-15</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-15',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Records&#148; </font></i>means, for any Receivable, all
contracts, books, records and other documents or information (including
computer programs, tapes, disks, software and related property and rights)
relating to such Receivable or the related Obligor.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Related Assets&#148;</font></i> means, with respect to the
Receivables:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
rights and interests (including without limitation ownership interests and
liens) to and in any Origination Home and/or other real or personal property
arising under or related to the related Relocating Employee Contracts, whether
or not evidenced by a deed and whether or not any such deed has been recorded,
and all proceeds of the sale or other disposition of any such property, including,
without limitation, the Origination Homes, the Origination Home Purchase
Contracts, the Origination Home Sale Contracts and all proceeds thereof;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
interest accrued or to accrue under the Relocating Employee Relocation Services
Agreements and the Relocation Services Agreements, including without limitation
interest on Equity Advances, Mortgage Payments, Final Equity Payments and
Miscellaneous Receivables;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
other collateral or other support arrangements made in connection with such Receivables
or property, including all warranty and indemnity claims, all lien filings and
all guaranties;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
security deposits delivered to an Originator in connection with any of the
foregoing;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
rights to any payment of rent or similar amounts in connection with any of the
foregoing;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
rights in respect of the Purchase Agreement, the Guaranty, the Relocating
Employee Contracts, the Relocation Services Agreements, any purchase or sale
contract, servicing agreement, interest rate hedge arrangement or other
contract or agreement in connection with the foregoing;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
insurance (including without limitation title, hazard, casualty and credit
insurance) and condemnation proceeds with respect to any of the foregoing;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
Records relating to such Receivables;</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
Collection Account, the BofA Box/Account, the other Lock-Box Accounts, the
Investment Account and funds, investments, financial assets or other property
credited to either such account; and</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(j)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>all
other proceeds of any of the foregoing, including without limitation all
present and future claims, demands, causes of action, chooses in action and
other general intangibles in respect of any or all of the foregoing and all of
the proceeds of every kind and nature whatsoever in respect of any of the
foregoing, whether in the form of cash or other liquid property, accounts,
accounts receivable, notes, drafts, acceptances, chattel</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-16</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-16',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">paper, checks, deposit accounts, insurance payments, condemnation
awards, instruments or other property.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Relocating Employee&#148;</font></i> means (i) a person
obligated to make payments in respect of an extension of credit to him or her
by an Originator, as evidenced by a Relocating Employee Contract, or (ii) a
person whose Origination Home may be transferred to, and/or disposed of by, an
Originator in order to satisfy obligations due in connection with a Relocating
Employee Contract.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Relocating Employee Contract&#148;</font></i> means a
contract with a Relocating Employee pursuant to which a Relocating Employee
Receivable arises including, without limitation, a note evidencing any Equity
Advance.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Relocating Employee Receivable&#148; </font></i>means each
obligation of an Relocating Employee to make payments in respect of an Equity
Advance by an Originator to him or her, and/or such Relocating Employee&#146;s
obligation to transfer, or permit the disposition of, his or her Origination
Home to repay or reimburse an Originator for any such Equity Advance, Final
Equity Payment or Mortgage Payment, including without limitation any rights to
any interest or finance charges arising in connection therewith.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Relocation Service Fee&#148;</font></i> means the fee payable
to an Originator by an Employer under the Relocation Services Agreement of such
Employer with respect to the marketing and sale of a particular Origination
Home.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Relocation Services Agreement&#148;</font></i> means any
relocation services agreement between an Originator and an Employer.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Reorganization&#148; </font></i>means with respect to any
Multiemployer Plan, the condition that such plan is in reorganization within
the meaning of Section&nbsp;4241 of ERISA.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Reportable Event&#148; </font></i>means any of the events set
forth in Section&nbsp;4043(c) of ERISA, other than those events as to which the
thirty day notice period is waived under PBGC Reg. &#167;&nbsp;2615 or any successor
regulation thereto.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Required Purchasers&#148;</font></i> is defined in Section&nbsp;8.4(c).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Reserve&#148; </font></i>means, at any time, 15% of the
Aggregate Investment.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#160;&#147;Reserved Collection Matters&#148;</font></i>
means decisions taken when no Termination Event exists regarding settlement
and/or whether to initiate or proceed with litigation regarding the collection
of Receivables identified in writing by the Servicers to the Agent as Reserved
Collection Matters in an aggregate amount not in excess of $1,000,000.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<i><font style="font-style:italic;">Restatement Date</font></i>&#148; means the date on
which all of the conditions precedent set forth in Section&nbsp;8.1 are
satisfied or waived by the Agent and the Purchasers.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-17</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-17',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Sale Contract Price&#148;</font></i> means, with respect to
any Origination Home, the price required to be paid thereunder by the purchaser
of such Origination Home under a valid and binding sale contract, which
contract shall not be subject to any contingency other than a financing
contingency.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;S&amp;P&#148;</font></i> means Standard &amp; Poor&#146;s Ratings
Services.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<i><font style="font-style:italic;">Securitizable Relocation Services Agreement</font></i>&#148;
means an Eligible Relocation Services Agreement which has been amended in a
manner that facilitates the securitization of payment obligations under such
agreement, in accordance, in the opinion of the Agent, with market standards
for securitization, including but not limited to, consent to assignment and
waiver of offset by the Obligors on the Receivables, the clarification of the
Obligors&#146; payment obligations and the due dates for such payments, the
segregation of the obligations to be financed from other contractual relations
between the Originators and such Obligors, and other requirements intended to
isolate the Receivables from the performance risk and bankruptcy estate of the
Originators.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Seller&#148;</font></i> is defined in the first paragraph
hereof.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Seller Account&#148;</font></i> means the Seller&#146;s account
number 30-0144740/5800691395 at National City Bank, or such other account
designated by the Seller to the Agent with at least ten (10)&nbsp;days prior
notice.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Servicer&#148; </font></i>is defined in Section&nbsp;3.1(a).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Servicer Fee&#148;</font></i> is defined in Section&nbsp;3.5.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Servicer Replacement Event&#148;</font></i> means the
occurrence of any Termination Event.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Settlement&#148;</font></i> means the sum of all claims and
rights to payment pursuant to Section&nbsp;1.4 or 1.6 or any other provision
owed to Purchasers (or owed to the Agent or the Servicer for the benefit of the
Purchasers) by the Seller that, if paid, would be applied to reduce the
Purchasers&#146; Investments.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Settlement Date&#148;</font></i> means (i) with respect to a
month which ends on a day other than Thursday or Friday, and provided that the
Wednesday on which, or the Wednesday immediately prior to which, such month
ends is a Business Day, the first Friday of the next succeeding month, and (ii)
with respect to any other month, the second Friday of the next succeeding
month; <i><font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font></i> in each case that if such first
or second Friday is not a Business Day, the Settlement Date shall be the
immediately succeeding Business Day.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Single Employer Plan&#148; </font></i>means any Plan which is
covered by Title IV of ERISA, but which is not a Multiemployer Plan.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;SIRVA Credit Agreement&#148;</font></i> means Credit
Agreement dated as of December&nbsp;1, 2003 among Parent, certain subsidiaries
thereof, the several lenders party thereto, JPMorgan Chase Bank, as
administrative agent, Banc of America Securities LLC, as syndication agent, and
Credit Suisse First Boston, Deutche Bank Securities Inc. and Goldman Sachs
Credit Partners L.P. as documentation agents.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-18</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>
