<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-18',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;SIRVA Entity&#148;</font></i> means any of the Parent, NAVL,
the Seller, the Servicers and the Originators.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;SIRVA Relo&#148;</font></i> is defined in the first paragraph
hereof.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Sold Interest&#148;</font></i> is defined in Section&nbsp;1.1(a).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Special Obligor&#148;</font></i> means (i) Pricewaterhouse
Coopers LLP, and (ii) any other Included Employer so designated in writing by
the Agent with the written consent of the Required Purchasers following a
request to do so by the Seller.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Special Obligor Limit&#148;</font></i> means the following
percentage of the Eligible Receivables Balance for the following Special
Obligor:&#160; (i) for Pricewaterhouse Coopers
LLP, 15% and (ii)&nbsp;for any other Special Obligor, such other Special
Obligor Limit as the Agent with the written consent of the Required Purchasers
may designate in a written notice to the Seller for such Special Obligor.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Specified Documents&#148; </font></i>means, with respect to
any Receivable,</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i) in the
case of an Equity Advance, the original (or to the extent of Permitted
Exceptions a copy) of an executed promissory note payable by the related
Relocating Employee,</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii) in the
case of a Final Equity Payment or Mortgage Payment Advance, the original
Origination Home Deed (or to the extent of Permitted Exceptions a copy
thereof), which deed provides the basis for the transaction giving rise to such
Relocating Employee Receivable and shall be in recordable form and shall name
the Seller (or, with respect to deeds received prior to the date hereof, an
Originator) as the owner of such Origination Home, together with an identical
original deed in recordable form (or to the extent of Permitted Exceptions a
copy thereof), which deed is executed by the Seller or an Originator, as
applicable, in blank or to the Origination Home Buyer,</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii) any
guarantees of the related Relocating Employee Receivable,</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv) in the
case of a Final Equity Payment or Mortgage Payment Advance, an original
executed copy of any pending contract for the purchase or sale of such
Origination Home,</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v) in the
case of a Final Equity Payment or Mortgage Payment Advance, any original title
policy or title commitment executed in connection with such purchase or sale
agreement, which title policy or commitment shall name the Seller and its
assigns as beneficiaries,</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vi) if
applicable, an original executed copy of any mortgage or deed of trust executed
by such Relocating Employee in connection with such Relocating Employee
Receivable, together with an assignment of such mortgage or deed of trust in
recordable form executed in blank by the Relocating Employee or the related
Originator,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-19</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-19',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vii) an
original executed copy of the related Relocation Services Agreement, and</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(viii) a copy
of the written direction to the related Origination Home Closing Agent to send
the proceeds of the sale of the Origination Home to the Collection Account.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Subordinated Note&#148;</font></i> means a revolving
promissory note issued by the Seller to an Originator under the Purchase
Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Subservicer&#148;</font></i> means Executive Relo as a
sub-Servicer hereunder.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Subsidiary&#148;</font></i> means any Person of which at
least a majority of the voting stock (or equivalent equity interests) is owned
or controlled by such Person or by one or more other Subsidiaries of such
Person.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Taxes&#148;</font></i> means all taxes, charges, fees, levies
or other assessments (including income, gross receipts, profits, withholding,
excise, property, sales, use, license, occupation and franchise taxes and
including any related interest, penalties or other additions) imposed by any
jurisdiction or taxing authority (whether foreign or domestic).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Termination Date&#148;</font></i> means the earliest of
(a)&nbsp;the Business Day designated by the Seller with no less than
thirty&nbsp;(30)&nbsp;days&#146; (or, during the continuance of a Trigger Event,
five (5) Business Days&#146;) prior notice to the Agent, (b)&nbsp;the date of the
occurrence of a Termination Event described in clause (e) of the definition of
Termination Event, (c) the date designated by the Agent to the Seller at any
time after the occurrence and during the continuance of any other Termination
Event and (d) September&nbsp;30, 2007.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Termination Event&#148;</font></i> means the occurrence of
any one or more of the following:</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
representation, warranty, certification or statement made, or deemed made by
any SIRVA Entity in, or pursuant to, any Transaction Document proves to have
been incorrect in any material respect when made or deemed made; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
SIRVA Entity fails to make any payment or other transfer of funds hereunder
when due (including any payments under Section&nbsp;1.4(a)); or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
Seller or the Servicer fails to observe or perform any covenant or agreement
contained in Sections&nbsp;3.3, 5.1(b), 5.1(e), 5.1(g), 5.1(i), 5.1(j), 5.2(b),
5.2(e), 5.2(h) or 5.2(i) of this Agreement or the Originator fails to observe
or perform any covenant or agreement contained in Sections&nbsp;5.1(b), 5.1(e),
5.1(g), 5.1(i) or 5.1(j) of the Purchase Agreement; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
SIRVA Entity fails to observe or perform any other term, covenant or agreement
under any Transaction Document, and such failure remains unremedied for 15
Business Days; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
SIRVA Entity suffers a Bankruptcy Event; or</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-20</font></p>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>the
Default Ratio exceeds 15% for any November, December, January&nbsp;or February&nbsp;or
10% for any other month, the Dilution Ratio exceeds 2% for any calendar month
or the Aged Receivables Ratio exceeds 15% for any November, December, January&nbsp;or
February&nbsp;or 10% for any other month; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>(i)
any SIRVA Entity, directly or indirectly, disaffirms or contests in writing the
validity or enforceability of any Transaction Document or (ii) any Transaction
Document fails to be the enforceable obligation of any SIRVA Entity party
thereto; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>(i)
any SIRVA Entity (A) generally does not pay its debts as such debts become due
or admits in writing its inability to pay its debts generally or (B) fails to
pay any of its indebtedness (except in aggregate principal amount of less than
$10,000,000) or defaults in the performance of any provision of any agreement
under which such indebtedness was created or is governed and such default
permits such indebtedness to be declared due and payable or to be required to
be prepaid before the scheduled maturity thereof or (ii) a default or
termination or similar event occurs under any agreement providing for the sale,
transfer or conveyance by SIRVA Entity of any of its financial assets; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
event of default occurs under the SIRVA Credit Agreement; provided that no
waiver thereunder or amendment thereof with respect to any events of default
under, or any financial covenants (including defined terms as used therein)
contained in, the Sirva Credit Agreement shall be effective for purposes of
this Agreement unless the Agent shall have consented thereto in writing; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(j)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>SIRVA,
Inc. ceases to own (directly or indirectly) all of the issued and outstanding
shares of capital stock, membership interests or other equity interests of any
other SIRVA Entity; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(k)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>during
the past twelve months more than ten percent of the average number of Employers
that were parties to Relocation Services Agreements over the past twelve months
have given notice of termination of such Relocation Service Agreements; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(l)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>on
or after December&nbsp;31, 2007, the Sold Interest shall be greater than $0 or
any other amount owed to the Agent or the Purchasers shall remain unpaid; or</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(m)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>any
Person shall engage in any &#147;prohibited transaction&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;406
of ERISA or Section&nbsp;4975 of the Code) involving any Plan, (ii) any &#147;accumulated
funding deficiency&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;302 of ERISA), whether or not
waived, shall exist with respect to any Plan or any Adverse Claim in favor of
the PBGC or a Plan shall arise on the assets of any SIRVA Entity or any
Commonly Controlled Entity, (iii) a Reportable Event shall occur with respect
to, or proceedings shall commence to have a trustee appointed, or a trustee
shall be appointed, to administer or to terminate, any Single Employer Plan,
which Reportable Event or commencement of proceedings or appointment of a
trustee is reasonably likely to result in the termination of such Plan for
purposes of Title IV of ERISA (other than a standard termination pursuant</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-21</font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-21',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">to Section&nbsp;4041(b) of ERISA), (iv) any Single Employer Plan shall
terminate for purposes of Title IV of ERISA (other than a standard termination
pursuant to Section&nbsp;4041(b) of ERISA), (v) any SIRVA Entity or other
Commonly Controlled Entity shall, or is reasonably likely to, incur any
liability in connection with a withdrawal from, or the Insolvency or
Reorganization of, a Multiemployer Plan, (vi) the occurrence or expected
occurrence of any event or condition which results or is reasonably likely to
result in any SIRVA Entity&#146;s or any Commonly Controlled Entity&#146;s becoming
responsible for any liability in respect of a Former Plan (other than a
standard termination pursuant to Section&nbsp;4041(b) of ERISA), or (vii) any
other event or condition shall occur or exist with respect to a Plan; and in
each case in clauses (i) through (vii) above, such event or condition, together
with all other such events or conditions, if any, would be reasonably expected
to result in liability which would have a Material Adverse Effect; or</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(n)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>one
or more judgments or decrees shall be entered against any SIRVA Entity
involving in the aggregate at any time a liability (net of any insurance or
indemnity payments actually received in respect thereof prior to or within 60
days from the entry thereof, or to be received in respect thereof in the event
any appeal thereof shall be unsuccessful) of $10,000,000 or more, and all such
judgments or decrees shall not have been vacated, discharged, stayed or bonded
pending appeal within 60 days from the entry thereof.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Tranche&#148;</font></i> means a portion of the Investment of
the Purchasers allocated to a Tranche Period pursuant to Section&nbsp;1.2.&#160; A Tranche is a Eurodollar Tranche or Prime
Tranche depending whether Discount accrues during its Tranche Period based on a
Eurodollar Rate or Prime Rate.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Tranche Period&#148;</font></i> means a period of days ending
on a Business Day selected pursuant to Section&nbsp;1.2, which (i) for a
Eurodollar Tranche shall be a period of seven days, one month, two months or
three months, and (ii)&nbsp;for a Prime Tranche shall be a number of days, not
to be less than 2 days and not to exceed 30 days.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Transaction Documents&#148;</font></i> means this Agreement,
the Fee Letter, the Purchase Agreement, the Subordinated Notes, the Guaranty,
the Bailment Agreements, the Consents to Assignment, and all other documents,
instruments and agreements executed or furnished in connection herewith and therewith.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Transfer Supplement&#148; </font></i>means an agreement among
the parties hereto pursuant to which an existing Purchaser transfers an
interest in its rights and obligations hereunder.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Trigger Event&#148;</font></i> is defined in the Purchase
Agreement.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;UCC&#148; </font></i>means, for any state, the Uniform
Commercial Code as in effect in such state.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<i><font style="font-style:italic;">Unbilled Miscellaneous Receivable&#148;</font></i> means
a Miscellaneous Receivable that is not a Billed Receivable.</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Unbilled Miscellaneous Receivable Excess Concentration&#148;</font></i>
means at any time (a) the aggregate outstanding principal balance of all
Unbilled Miscellaneous Receivables included in the Eligible Receivables, minus
(b) 15% of the Eligible Receivables Balance.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-22</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='I-22',FILE='C:\JMS\eudelhofen\04-14642-3\task264681\14642-3-mm-07.htm',USER='eudelho',CD='Dec 29 10:53 2004' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;United States&#148;</font></i> means the United States of
America (including all states and political subdivisions thereof).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Unsold Origination Home Receivable&#148; </font></i>means a
Receivable incurred in respect of an Equity Advance, Final Equity Payment or
Mortgage Payment on an Origination Home that has not yet been sold to an
Origination Home Buyer (or the sale of which has not been closed or the sale
proceeds of which have not been received).</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Unused Commitment&#148;</font></i> means, for any Purchaser
at any time, the difference between its Commitment and its Investment then outstanding.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><i><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-style:italic;">&#147;Weekly Reporting Date&#148;</font></i> means Thursday of each
week or, if such day is not a Business Day, the immediately preceding Business
Day.</p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="left" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:left;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The foregoing definitions shall be equally applicable to both the
singular and plural forms of the defined terms.&#160;
Unless otherwise inconsistent with the terms of this Agreement, all
accounting terms used herein shall be interpreted, and all accounting
determinations hereunder shall be made, in accordance with GAAP.&#160; Amounts to be calculated hereunder shall be
continuously recalculated at the time any information relevant to such
calculation changes.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-23</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</div>

 </tr>

  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.86%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#NoProceeding" title="Click to goto No Proceeding">No Proceedings</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.02%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:13.1%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 40.0pt;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#Confidentialit" title="Click to goto Confidentialit">8.12</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.86%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;"><a href="#Confidentialit" title="Click to goto Confidentialit">Confidentiality</a></font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.02%;">
  <p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="13%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:13.1%;">

  </td>
  <td width="78%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:78.86%;">

  Act Notice</a></font></p>

  <td width="8%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:8.02%;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ii</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>
